78  template<class ObjectType>
79  inline int SceneManager::MoveObjectToScene(int to, int from, int object_index)
80  {
81  int new_index = -1;
82  Scene& source = GetScene(from);
83  Scene& destination = GetScene(to);
84  try {
85  std::unique_ptr<Object> object = source.Objects.PopObject<ObjectType>(object_index);
86  if (object.get()) {
87  new_index = destination.Objects.AddObject(std::move(object));
88  }
89  }
90  catch (const std::exception& exception) {
91  India::Utilities::HandleException(exception);
92  }
93  return new_index;
94  }
95 
99  template<class ObjectType>
100  inline int SceneManager::MoveObjectToScene(std::string to, std::string from, int object_index)
101  {
102  return MoveObjectToScene<ObjectType>(GetScene(to).GetIndex(), GetScene(from).GetIndex(), object_index);
103  }
104 
108  template<class SceneType>
109  inline void SceneManager::AddScene(std::unique_ptr<SceneType> scene) noexcept
110  {
111  if (scene.get() != nullptr) {
112  _scenes.push_back(std::move(scene));
113  _scenes.back()->SetIndex(_scene_id_increment);
114  ++_scene_id_increment;
115  _scene_dictionary.emplace(_scenes.back()->ToString(), *_scenes.back());
116  LoadScene(_scenes.size() - 1);
117  }
118  else {
119  throw SceneManagerException("Tried adding non-existent scene");
120  }
121  }
122 
126  template<typename SceneType>
127  inline std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<Scene>> SceneManager::GetScenes() const
128  {
129  std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<Scene>> scenes = {};
130  bool get_all_scenes = std::is_same<Scene, SceneType>::value;
131  for (auto& scene : _scenes) {
132  if (get_all_scenes || dynamic_cast<SceneType*>(scene.get())) {
133  scenes.push_back(*scene.get());
134  }
135  }
136  return scenes;
137  }

139 }
